prodNameC: 羅氏抗Kappa兔多株一級抗體
prodNameE: Roche CONFIRMTM anti-Kappa Rabbit polyclonal Primary Antibody
ingredientsDesc:
CONFIRM anti-Kappa Rabbit Polyclonal contains sufficient reagent for 50 tests. 
1 – 5 mL dispenser of CONFIRM anti-Kappa Rabbit Polyclonal contains approximately 33.5 μg of a rabbit polyclonal antibody directed against an epitope present on human 
kappa light chains present in tissue.

The antibody is diluted in 0.05 M Tris-HCI with 2% carrier protein, and 0.10% ProClin 300, 
a preservative containing the active ingredients 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one and 
2- methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one. 

Total protein concentration of the reagent is approximately 16.25μg/mL. Specific antibody concentration is approximately 6.7μg/mL. There is no known irrelevant antibody reactivity observed in this product.
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy: Ventana Medical Systems(Ventana)的CONFIRM抗Kappa兔多株一級抗體是一個對抗kappa免疫球蛋白輕鏈的兔多株抗體。Kappa輕鏈的染色可用於輔助確定正常及異常B細胞系列的細胞。此抗體是供實驗室用於在Ventana自動切片染色機上對福馬林固定、石蠟包埋組織切片內表現了kappa輕鏈免疫球蛋白的B細胞和漿細胞進行定性染色。CONFIRM抗Kappa兔多株抗體可以特異地與正常B細胞和漿細胞位於細胞膜和細胞質區域內的抗原結合。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.1860 免疫病理組織化學試劑與套組
